Content.Text:
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Oh, this dish here? That's my lunch!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't have many patrons at the moment
so I'm just taking my lunch break. A
little late lunch! 
<PAGE>
Would you care to join me, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! I love to eat with someone else.
Food just tastes better when you're
sharing it!
<PAGE>
Please, go ahead. Sit down!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, let us give thanks to the
one who made all the ingredients, and
the one who prepared the meal!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, but this look good too!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Phew, that was delicious!<RED>∀</RED> I can see
why people come here to eat every day!
Hey, hold on a moment!
<PAGE>
<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS><MYNAME>, there's still food on your
plate. You're not going to eat that?
Take it home and eat it later

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, are you sure? Of course, I'll
happily take it off your hands...
Thanks!<RED>∀</RED>

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you so much for today. The food
you shared with me was really delicious,
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, I'm so happy! You're a very nice
person, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
If possible, let's eat together again
some time soon. I'm looking forward to
it already!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No, it's nothing. I'll wrap it up and
you can take it with you. Just wait one
moment!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for today. Do come again soon.
I'm looking forward to it already!
